data.name: Snivy
data.flavorText: It is very intelligent and calm. Being exposed to lots of sunlight makes its movements swifter.

data.name: Maractus
data.flavorText: It uses an up-tempo song and dance to drive away the bird Pokémon that prey on its flower seeds.

data.name: Tepig
data.flavorText: It blows fire through its nose. When it catches a cold, the fire becomes pitch-black smoke instead.

data.name: Oshawott
data.flavorText: It fights using the scalchop on its stomach. In response to an attack, it retaliates immediately by slashing.

data.name: Alomomola
data.flavorText: Floating in the open sea is how they live. When they find a wounded Pokémon, they embrace it and bring it to shore.

data.name: Blitzle
data.flavorText: Its mane shines when it discharges electricity. They use their flashing manes to communicate with one another.

data.name: Munna
data.flavorText: It eats the dreams of people and Pokémon. When it eats a pleasant dream, it expels pink-colored mist.

data.name: Sandile
data.flavorText: It moves along below the sand's surface, except for its nose and eyes. A dark membrane shields its eyes from the sun.

data.name: Zorua
data.flavorText: It changes into the forms of others to surprise them. Apparently, it often transforms into a silent child.

data.name: Klink
data.flavorText: The two minigears that mesh together are predetermined. Each will rebound from other minigears without meshing.

data.name: Pidove
data.flavorText: These Pokémon live in cities. They are accustomed to people. Flocks often gather in parks and plazas.

data.name: Audino
data.flavorText: It touches others with the feelers on its ears, using the sound of their heartbeats to tell how they are feeling.
